about_the_game:
The all-new snowball is perfect tool for all those who mastered the other weapons in the game. Unleash devastating new effects on enemies and grant powerful supporting effects on your allies too. Beware, this is not your average snowball - you need high precession and good timing to make the most out of this Snow Day favorite.

The snowball also comes with new cosmetics to make the most of your Snow Day!

Includes:
  • Weapon: Snowball with 6 upgrade cards
  • Hat: Stocking Cap
  • Glasses: Ski Goggles

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent depiction of fart clouds, feces, urine and other gross ways to use against enemies.

detailed_description:
This DLC is included here:

SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY! - Season Pass


About the Game

The all-new snowball is perfect tool for all those who mastered the other weapons in the game. Unleash devastating new effects on enemies and grant powerful supporting effects on your allies too. Beware, this is not your average snowball - you need high precession and good timing to make the most out of this Snow Day favorite.

The snowball also comes with new cosmetics to make the most of your Snow Day!

Includes:
  • Weapon: Snowball with 6 upgrade cards
  • Hat: Stocking Cap
  • Glasses: Ski Goggles
